channel.title: Vodka on Need a drink?
channel.description: Recent content in Vodka on Need a drink?

item.title: Bloody Mary
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml vodka
  • 90 ml tomato juice
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce
  • 2 dashes hot sauce
  • pinch celery salt
  • pinch pepper
  • celery stalk
  • lemon wedge

Instructions

  1. Build in highball glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with celery and lemon.

item.title: Cosmopolitan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml vodka (citron)
  • 30 ml triple sec
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml cranberry juice
  • lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.
